article_title: Hurt: Little concern about redistricting impact
article_text:

og.description: While the political climate in the Virginia legislature continues to heat up over issues such as the federal court mandate to redraw congressional districts, Rep. Robert Hurt, R-5th, is pounding the pavement the throughout his district.
